verses.text_plain: And Elijah the Tishbite, who was of the inhabitants of Gilead, said unto Ahab, As the Lord God of Israel liveth, before whom I stand, there shall not be dew nor rain these years, but according to my word.
verses.verse_html:
1And Elijah the Tishbite, who was of the inhabitants of Gilead, said unto Ahab, As the Lord God of Israel liveth, before whom I stand, there shall not be dew nor rain these years, but according to my word. ▼
▼ Elijah: Heb. Elijahu: Gr. Elias

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Elijah: Heb. Elijahu: Gr. Elias

verses.text_plain: And the word of the Lord came unto him, saying,
verses.verse_html: 2And the word of the Lord came unto him, saying,

verses.text_plain: Get thee hence, and turn thee eastward, and hide thyself by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.
verses.verse_html: 3Get thee hence, and turn thee eastward, and hide thyself by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.

verses.text_plain: And it shall be, that thou shalt drink of the brook; and I have commanded the ravens to feed thee there.
verses.verse_html: 4And it shall be, that thou shalt drink of the brook; and I have commanded the ravens to feed thee there.

verses.text_plain: So he went and did according unto the word of the Lord: for he went and dwelt by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.
verses.verse_html: 5So he went and did according unto the word of the Lord: for he went and dwelt by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.

verses.text_plain: And the ravens brought him bread and flesh in the morning, and bread and flesh in the evening; and he drank of the brook.
verses.verse_html: 6And the ravens brought him bread and flesh in the morning, and bread and flesh in the evening; and he drank of the brook.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass after a while, that the brook dried up, because there had been no rain in the land.
verses.verse_html:
7And it came to pass after a while, that the brook dried up, because there had been no rain in the land. ▼
▼ after…: Heb. at the end of days

tokens.text: And it came to pass after
because there had been no rain

footnotes.body_text: ▼ after…: Heb. at the end of days
footnotes.body_html: ▼ after…: Heb. at the end of days

verses.text_plain: And the word of the Lord came unto him, saying,
verses.verse_html: 8And the word of the Lord came unto him, saying,

verses.text_plain: Arise, get thee to Zarephath, which belongeth to Zidon, and dwell there: behold, I have commanded a widow woman there to sustain thee.
verses.verse_html:
9Arise, get thee to Zarephath, which belongeth to Zidon, and dwell there: behold, I have commanded a widow woman there to sustain thee. ▼
▼ Zarephath: Gr. Sarepta

verses.text_plain: So he arose and went to Zarephath. And when he came to the gate of the city, behold, the widow woman was there gathering of sticks: and he called to her, and said, Fetch me, I pray thee, a little water in a vessel, that I may drink.
verses.verse_html: 10So he arose and went to Zarephath. And when he came to the gate of the city, behold, the widow woman was there gathering of sticks: and he called to her, and said, Fetch me, I pray thee, a little water in a vessel, that I may drink.

tokens.text: me, I pray thee, a little

verses.text_plain: And as she was going to fetch it, he called to her, and said, Bring me, I pray thee, a morsel of bread in thine hand.
verses.verse_html: 11And as she was going to fetch it, he called to her, and said, Bring me, I pray thee, a morsel of bread in thine hand.

tokens.text: me, I pray thee, a morsel

verses.text_plain: And she said, As the Lord thy God liveth, I have not a cake, but an handful of meal in a barrel, and a little oil in a cruse: and, behold, I am gathering two sticks, that I may go in and dress it for me and my son, that we may eat it, and die.
verses.verse_html: 12And she said, As the Lord thy God liveth, I have not a cake, but an handful of meal in a barrel, and a little oil in a cruse: and, behold, I am gathering two sticks, that I may go in and dress it for me and my son, that we may eat it, and die.

tokens.text: it for me and my son

verses.text_plain: And Elijah said unto her, Fear not; go and do as thou hast said: but make me thereof a little cake first, and bring it unto me, and after make for thee and for thy son.
verses.verse_html: 13And Elijah said unto her, Fear not; go and do as thou hast said: but make me thereof a little cake first, and bring it unto me, and after make for thee and for thy son.

tokens.text: for thee and for thy son

verses.text_plain: For thus saith the Lord God of Israel, The barrel of meal shall not waste, neither shall the cruse of oil fail, until the day that the Lord sendeth rain upon the earth.
verses.verse_html:
14For thus saith the Lord God of Israel, The barrel of meal shall not waste, neither shall the cruse of oil fail, until the day that the Lord sendeth rain upon the earth. ▼
▼ sendeth: Heb. giveth

verses.text_plain: And she went and did according to the saying of Elijah: and she, and he, and her house, did eat many days.
verses.verse_html:
15And she went and did according to the saying of Elijah: and she, and he, and her house, did eat many days. ▼
▼ many…: or, a full year

tokens.text: and she, and he, and her house

footnotes.body_html: ▼ many…: or, a full year

verses.text_plain: And the barrel of meal wasted not, neither did the cruse of oil fail, according to the word of the Lord, which he spake by Elijah.
verses.verse_html:
16And the barrel of meal wasted not, neither did the cruse of oil fail, according to the word of the Lord, which he spake by Elijah. ▼
▼ by: Heb. by the hand of

footnotes.body_text: ▼ by: Heb. by the hand of
footnotes.body_html: ▼ by: Heb. by the hand of

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass after these things, that the son of the woman, the mistress of the house, fell sick; and his sickness was so sore, that there was no breath left in him.
verses.verse_html: 17And it came to pass after these things, that the son of the woman, the mistress of the house, fell sick; and his sickness was so sore, that there was no breath left in him.

tokens.text: And it came to pass after

verses.text_plain: And she said unto Elijah, What have I to do with thee, O thou man of God? art thou come unto me to call my sin to remembrance, and to slay my son?
verses.verse_html: 18And she said unto Elijah, What have I to do with thee, O thou man of God? art thou come unto me to call my sin to remembrance, and to slay my son?

tokens.text: What have I to do with thee, O thou man

verses.text_plain: And he said unto her, Give me thy son. And he took him out of her bosom, and carried him up into a loft, where he abode, and laid him upon his own bed.
verses.verse_html: 19And he said unto her, Give me thy son. And he took him out of her bosom, and carried him up into a loft, where he abode, and laid him upon his own bed.

verses.text_plain: And he cried unto the Lord, and said, O Lord my God, hast thou also brought evil upon the widow with whom I sojourn, by slaying her son?
verses.verse_html: 20And he cried unto the Lord, and said, O Lord my God, hast thou also brought evil upon the widow with whom I sojourn, by slaying her son?

verses.text_plain: And he stretched himself upon the child three times, and cried unto the Lord, and said, O Lord my God, I pray thee, let this child’s soul come into him again.
verses.verse_html:
21And he stretched himself upon the child three times, and cried unto the Lord, and said, O Lord my God, I pray thee, let this child’s soul come into him again. ▼
▼ stretched: Heb. measured
 , ▼
▼ into…: Heb. into his inward parts

tokens.text: I pray thee, let this child’s

footnotes.body_text: ▼ into…: Heb. into his inward parts
footnotes.body_html: ▼ into…: Heb. into his inward parts

verses.text_plain: And the Lord heard the voice of Elijah; and the soul of the child came into him again, and he revived.
verses.verse_html: 22And the Lord heard the voice of Elijah; and the soul of the child came into him again, and he revived.

verses.text_plain: And Elijah took the child, and brought him down out of the chamber into the house, and delivered him unto his mother: and Elijah said, See, thy son liveth.
verses.verse_html: 23And Elijah took the child, and brought him down out of the chamber into the house, and delivered him unto his mother: and Elijah said, See, thy son liveth.

verses.text_plain: And the woman said to Elijah, Now by this I know that thou art a man of God, and that the word of the Lord in thy mouth is truth.
verses.verse_html: 24And the woman said to Elijah, Now by this I know that thou art a man of God, and that the word of the Lord in thy mouth is truth.
